done_condition: Complete one loop of a scene
prompt:
RUN LINES / REHEARSAL (Agent-driven)

Goal: rehearse a scene with distinct voices per character. Stage directions should be printed, not spoken.

Tip: the Break menu's Acting lane includes your 3 most recent scenes (ordered by last practiced) when available.

FAST START (PDF):
1) Import a scene PDF:
   ./site-toggle run-lines import /path/to/scene.pdf --format colon --title "My Scene" --json
2) See characters:
   ./site-toggle run-lines characters <script_id> --json
3) List available Edge TTS voices (authoritative list):
   ./site-toggle run-lines tts-voices --lang en-US --json
4) Set voices for characters:
   ./site-toggle run-lines set-voice <script_id> --character "WENDLA" --voice en-US-JennyNeural --rate +0% --json

MODES (varieties):
- Only read other parts (you stay silent):
  ./site-toggle run-lines practice <script_id> --me "Melchior" --mode practice --loop 3
- Read other parts + reveal your line after the pause:
  ./site-toggle run-lines practice <script_id> --me "Melchior" --mode learn --reveal-after --loop 2
- Read all parts aloud (table read):
  ./site-toggle run-lines practice <script_id> --read-all --loop 1
- Speed through:
  ./site-toggle run-lines practice <script_id> --me "Melchior" --mode boss --loop 1 --no-directions

FIXING SCRIPT ARTIFACTS (one-time, persistent):
- Inspect a range:
  ./site-toggle run-lines lines <script_id> --from 1 --to 120 --json
- Patch lines (agent applies based on your feedback):
  Drop a range:    ./site-toggle run-lines patch <script_id> drop-range --from N --to M --json
  Merge lines:     ./site-toggle run-lines patch <script_id> merge --idx N --count 2 --json
  Set speaker:     ./site-toggle run-lines patch <script_id> set-speaker --idx N --speaker "MORITZ" --json
  Set type:        ./site-toggle run-lines patch <script_id> set-type --idx N --type action --json
  Replace text:    ./site-toggle run-lines patch <script_id> replace-text --idx N --match "COPIONI" --with "" --json

NOTE: voices come from Edge TTS (edge-tts). If something sounds off, just say what to change and the agent will patch it once.
